name: Snow Dirt Bike Santa
description:
Snow Dirt Bike Santa is a challenging game where you have to Race your massive Dirt Bike under various (and increasingly difficult) circumstances On Ice Roads. If you are a Racing enthusiast or have ever wondered how they manage these monsters, try this game! It requires precision driving skills and endless patience to succeed.
So what are we waiting for?
Take on the exhilaratingly steep slopes of these huge mountain cliffs with awsome vehicle and perform tricks to Impress your opponents . The aim of the game is to reach the finishing line before your opponents do!

* Addictive as hell, start easy and progress
* Awesome 3D graphics and amazing gameplay
* Easy to control -
Enjoy this realistic experience
